# Test that basic functions work

vim ex 'e main.go'
vim ex 'call cursor(6,6)'
vim expr 'GOVIMHover()'
stdout '^\Q"func fmt.Println(a ...interface{}) (n int, err error)"\E$'
! stderr .+

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

-- main.go --
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	fmt.Println("Hello, world")
}
